page.title: 12A DAY IN MY DADS LIFE 2
page.content:
My Dad became a brewer after working at the Three Tuns pub on a building job.
Then a job became vacant as assistant brewer and my Dad started working there.He liked it so much he stayed on.He makes on average of about 15 barrels of beer per week through out the year.(540 gallons).He has been working there seven years. He makes (1) Bitter (2) Mild (3) Steamer, and a special Xmas brew called Scrooge. He also brews special beers usually for Royal ocassions.He has worked there for seven years and enjoys his work very much.
